mapper.sql: a.id, a.user_id, a.sex, a.birthday, a.native_area as "areaP.id", b.name as "areaP.name", a.work_area as "areaC.id", c.name as "areaC.name", a.position, a.userlevel, a.franchisee_id, f.id as "franchisee.id", f.name as "franchisee.name", a.office_id, a.self_intro, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.teachers_comment AS teachersComment, a.teachers_star_level AS teachersStarLevel, a.work_year AS 'workYear', a.service_manifesto AS 'serviceManifesto', a.teachers_name AS 'teachersName', d.user_id as "contuser_id", d.name as "contname", d.url as "conturl", d.content_type as "content_type", d.status as "status"
LEFT JOIN sys_area b on a.native_area=b.id LEFT JOIN sys_area c on a.work_area=c.id LEFT JOIN sys_franchisee f on f.id=a.franchisee_id LEFT JOIN sys_userinfo_content d on a.user_id=d.user_id
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user_info( id, user_id, sex, birthday, native_area, work_area, position, userlevel, franchisee_id, office_id, self_intro, teachers_comment, teachers_star_level, work_year, service_manifesto, teachers_name, create_time, update_time )values( #{id}, #{userid}, #{sex}, #{birthday}, #{nativearea}, #{workarea}, #{position}, #{userlevel}, #{franchiseeid}, #{officeid}, #{selfintro}, #{teachersComment}, #{teachersStarLevel}, #{workYear}, #{serviceManifesto}, #{teachersName}, SYSDATE(), NULL )
mapper.update: update sys_user_info set sex=#{sex}, birthday=#{birthday}, native_area=#{nativearea}, work_area=#{workarea}, position=#{position}, userlevel=#{userlevel}, franchisee_id=#{franchiseeid}, office_id=#{officeid}, self_intro=#{selfintro}, teachers_comment=#{teachersComment}, teachers_star_level=#{teachersStarLevel}, work_year = #{workYear}, service_manifesto = #{serviceManifesto}, teachers_name = #{teachersName}, update_time=SYSDATE() where user_id=#{userid}
